text: Paul Spyros Sarbanes (February 3, 1933 - December 6, 2020) was an American politician and attorney. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives from 1971 to 1977 and as a United States Senator from 1977 to 2007 representing Maryland. Sarbanes died at his home in Baltimore, Maryland from heart failure on December 6, 2020 at the age of 87.Paul Sarbanes, U.S. Senator Who Co-Wrote Anti-Fraud Law, Dies at 87 ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:United States senators from Maryland Category:United States representatives from Maryland Category:Lawyers from Maryland Category:People from Salisbury, Maryland Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Paul Sarbanes
